author: Special Correspondent
text:
Tamil Nadu Governor K. Rosaiah on Sunday condoled the death of veteran Communist Party of India leader A.B. Bardhan.

In his condolence message, Mr. Rosaiah said he was deeply shocked and grieved to hear about the demise of the former General Secretary of the Communist Party of India.

“A.B. Bardhan has made immense contribution to the working class, trade unions and to the uplift of the downtrodden. His death is an irreparable loss to the labour community. I convey my deepest condolences to the bereaved members of the family,” the Governor’s message from the Raj Bhavan stated.

Mr. Bardhan died on Saturday evening after a long illness. He was 92.
title: Governor condoles Bardhan’s death
